X.C47121t6.text: Basic Attribute
Height Mode
If max 6 is selected, the opened sheet can be at most 6 percent of the screen. If fixed 7 is selected, the opened sheet is fixed 7 percent of the screen. Both under portrait screen.
The opened sheet can pull up to fullscreen.
Floating Nav Bar
If checked, the nav bar will overlay above the content instead of being placed to the top of the content.
Show Back Icon
The opened sheet will show go back icon.
Show Close Icon
The opened sheet will show close icon.
Dark Theme
The opened sheet will be shown under dark theme.
Bottom Function
Visible When Keyboard Show
The bottom function will still be shown under input mode.
Bottom Function Style
Style 1 shows horizontal buttons. Style 2 shows vertical buttons.
Header Configuration
If the title is set, the tab bar configuration is not working.
If the subtitle is set, the tab bar configuration is not working.
You can add text tab or icon tab.
Start Text Button
You can add a start text button.
Start Icon
You can add a start icon. If choose back icon, the icon will act as going back.
End Text Button
You can add an end text button.
End Icon
You can add an end icon. If choose close icon, the icon will act as closing sheet stack.
Nav Bar Separator
If checked, a separator will be shown for non floating nav bar.
Live Sheet
Choose a launch mode, a new sheet with the chosen configuration will be shown.
Spark Sheet
Choose a launch mode, a spark sheet will be shown.
Spark Offline Sheet
Choose a launch mode, a spark offline sheet will be shown.
Open a schema.
Lorem Sheet
Choose a launch mode, a specified count character sheet will be shown. Intended for testing adaptive max 6 sheet.
